job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you have a creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems? If so then you will enjoy working in our EUV Source Laser department! It's a great opportunity for professional development and personal growth. Especially when you are a true self-starter who likes to understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system.
       You are part of a multidisciplinary team that focuses on performance qualification, integration and feasibility studies in order to secure the next generation EUV Source Laser.
       Role and responsibilities
          + Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
          + Monitor integrity of system architecture during development, ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
          + Perform feasibility studies, support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
          + Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
          + Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
          + Define, plan, manage own backlog of work
job_details.full_text:
System Integration and Test Engineer

Do you have a creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems? If so then you will enjoy working in our EUV Source Laser department! It's a great opportunity for professional development and personal growth. Especially when you are a true self-starter who likes to understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system.
       You are part of a multidisciplinary team that focuses on performance qualification, integration and feasibility studies in order to secure the next generation EUV Source Laser.
       Role and responsibilities
          + Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
          + Monitor integrity of system architecture during development, ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
          + Perform feasibility studies, support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
          + Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
          + Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
          + Define, plan, manage own backlog of work

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on system integration, testing, and understanding complex hardware systems (EUV Source Laser). While it mentions problem-solving and working in a multidisciplinary team, it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The tasks described are more aligned with traditional hardware engineering and system integration rather than the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications' indicates an understanding of broader product strategy and how technical work aligns with it.
job_tasks.phrase: support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes' highlights the need to understand how technical information impacts business decisions and to facilitate clear communication.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly ML modeling, 'feasibility studies' and 'performance qualification' can involve analytical modeling to assess system behavior and potential outcomes.
The phrase 'analyze and report out results' implies a process of interpreting data and potentially building models or performing analyses to understand system performance.

The phrase 'Integrate knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding' suggests a role in bringing together different components or systems, which can involve software integration aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitor integrity of system architecture during development' implies involvement in the development lifecycle and ensuring the robustness of the system, which can include software architecture.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor integrity of system architecture during development

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process' involves aspects of defining and managing the testing phase of development.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance' involves engineering problem-solving within a system context, which can include software or hardware engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Define, plan, manage own backlog of work' is a common practice in agile development and operations, indicating a structured approach to managing tasks and projects.
job_tasks.phrase: Define, plan, manage own backlog of work

soft_skills.phrase: creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems
understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system
communication of specifications to all relevant parties
